EMPLOYEE CODE : {{doc.employee}}

PERFORMANCE APPRAISAL AND COMPENSATION STATEMENT


Your Performance review has been successfully completed and we recognize the performance achieved by you based on the feedback given by your reporting in charge and the management. It is our pleasure to inform you that your compensation structure has been revised with effect from {{doc.get_formatted('effect_from')}} as follows and is detailed in your "Compensation Summary" Annexure


Present Designation :{{doc.designation}}
Revised Designation :{{doc.actual_designation}}
Current CTC/ Year :{{doc.old_ctc_as_per_annum}}
Revised CTC/ Year :{{frappe.utils.rounded(doc.ctcperannum)}}

Your salary details are strictly private and confidential and details in this letter must not be disclosed and discussed to others. Please acknowledge your acceptance of the revised terms by signing a duplicate copy of this letter.


We take this opportunity to place on record our appreciation for your contribution. We look forward to your continued support in future.


Wishing you all the best for the year ahead and to be filled with more success and achievements!!


Best Regards,
From WTT INTERNATIONAL,


V.PRIYA
ADMINISTRATIVE DIRECTOR

Employee Signature



{{doc.employee_name}}
{{doc.actual_designation}}
